definition.procedurexml: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block deletable="false" type="event_trigger" x="40" y="40"><field If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.01</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">CUSTOM:falling_rocks</field><field name="soundcategory">ambient</field><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">5</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
